price: 63. Miyaanay ogayn in qofkii khilaafa Alle iyo Rasuulkiisa inuu mudan Naarta Jahannama uu ku dhex waarayo weligi. Kaasi weeye dufowga weyn.
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّهُۥ مَن يُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدٗا فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخِزۡيُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alam yaʿlamū annahu man yuḥādidi al-laha warasūlahu fa-anna lahu nāra jahannama khālidan fīhā dhālika al-khiz'yu al-ʿaẓīmu
